|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F8040; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDINBDG4-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|serial = yes,, USB (Type-C) Female,, console port,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CN8

|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 637078259742 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE1216V2-20 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WLE1216V5-20 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Sunspear V1 Rev: 1.0", "E119921 HL12-V0 94V-0", :and "2013" are silk-screened on the board top.
*Models: V-81 (Wired), V-81R, V-81W (WiFi), V-81WLR, :V-81WL (WiFi-LTE), V-81WD (WiFi-DSL)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F8040 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM *WLAN: 4×4 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) :2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 *Network: 9x GbE (WAN/LAN) ports, :1x GbE/SFP shared port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe sockets, :1x M.2 (B-Key) socket *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/products/1500-security-gateway-datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
